Episodes.Title: Where Were We?
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall becomes predictably depressed and pathetic after the breakup. And it only gets worse when he discovers that Lily may be back in town.

Episodes.Title: The Scorpion and the Toad
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney gets Marshall back out on the singles market, but Barney keeps taking all the prospects from him. And Ted's convinced that Lily is back because she wants Marshall back, even though she says she's never been better.

Episodes.Title: Brunch
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Stephen Lloyd
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted discovers that his parents are keeping a secret from him after his dad acts as Barney's wingman, and Marshall and Lily intentionally try to get each other sexually aroused.

Episodes.Title: Ted Mosby, Architect
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kristin Newman
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney tells Ted that single women like architects. But will Ted use this useful tidbit of information to cheat on Robin after they have their first fight?

Episodes.Title: World's Greatest Couple
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Brenda Hsueh
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Lily gets introduced to Barney's bachelor pad when she needs a place to stay, and Marshall finds a unlikely new friend to join him for brunch, concerts and musicals.

Episodes.Title: Aldrin Justice
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted gets Lily a job at his firm, but she only makes trouble for Ted when he refuses to stand up to his boss. And Barney sleeps with Marshall's law school professor to help his grades, but she's less than impressed with his prowess.

Episodes.Title: Swarley
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Greg Malins
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The guys tell Marshall to stay away from his new date because she has "crazy eyes," but she couldn't be any crazier than Lily after she learns that Marshall's going out on his first new date.

Episodes.Title: Atlantic City
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Maria Ferrari
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall and Lily elope to Atlantic City, but they discover that getting married in Atlantic City isn't as easy as getting married in Las Vegas.

Episodes.Title: Slap Bet
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: The gang discovers that Robin's been hiding a huge secret, but they have no idea what it is. Marshall thinks she is married, and Barney thinks she was a porn star.

Episodes.Title: Single Stamina
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kristin Newman
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney's gay black brother is in town, but he doesn't want to tell Barney that he's getting married because he'll be losing his only single sidekick.

Episodes.Title: How Lily Stole Christmas
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Brenda Hsueh
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Lily takes away her Christmas display after she finds out that Ted called her a bad name while she was broken up with Marshall, and Barney is too sick for his Christmas plans.

Episodes.Title: First Time in New York
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Robin tries to keep her younger sister from losing her virginity while on vacation in New York, which causes everyone to reminisce about their first times.

Episodes.Title: Columns
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Matt Kuhn
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney asks Lily to paint a nude picture of him after finding her painting of Marshall. And Ted can't find an opportune time to fire his old boss, who now works for him but still keeps undermining his work.

Episodes.Title: Monday Night Football
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Everybody misses the Super Bowl because of a funeral. Therefore, they all try to go 24 hours without finding out who won so that they can watch the game together on Monday night.

Episodes.Title: Lucky Penny
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Jamie Rhonheimer
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Ted misses his important business trip to Chicago, he tries to trace his steps back to the original incident that triggered the series of events that made him miss the flight.

Episodes.Title: Stuff
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Kourtney Kang
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted tries to get rid of everything he received from other women at Robin's request, but getting rid of the stuff Robin received from other men won't be as easy. Meanwhile, Barney gets revenge on Lily for making him attend her terr...

Episodes.Title: Arrivederci, Fiero
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Chris Harris
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: When Marshall's car doesn't quite make it to 200,000 miles without dying completely, everybody reminisces about their greatest memories with the car.

Episodes.Title: Moving Day
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Maria Ferrari
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted and Robin decide to move in together, but nobody appears to be happy with the new living arrangements--especially Barney.

Episodes.Title: Bachelor Party
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Ted changes Barney's bachelor party plans for Marshall at the last minute, so that it won't just consist of gambling and cheap strippers. And Robin gets Lily an inappropriate shower party gift.

Episodes.Title: Showdown
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Barney becomes a contestant on "The Price Is Right" so that he can confront Bob Barker, because he believes that the game show host is his biological father.

Episodes.Title: Something Borrowed
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Greg Malins
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: Marshall and Lily's wedding is destined to become a disaster, until fate intervenes and makes it perfect.

Episodes.Title: Something Blue
Episodes.Writer: Carter Bays, Craig Thomas, Gloria Calderón Kellett
Episodes.Actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders
Episodes.Plot: As the happy couple celebrate their wedding, Ted and Robin tell Barney about the latest development of their relationship.
